info.description:
Top to Bottom: type of v =  #def, const , var (fixed), varying.
Left: v/v with v=0    ->  all should be NaN (black).  But we get 3,4: 0 (purple)
Right: pow(v,v) with v=0 -> despite NaN mathwise, should ber 1 specwise (pink). But we get 1,2: 0 (purple)
info.name: 0/0; pow(0,0)

renderpass.name: Image
